mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_distribution_records(f_id , r_id , p_id , state , create_one , create_time) SELECT #{id} , r.id , #{packageId} , 0 , #{createOne}, SYSDATE() FROM t_resource r , t_package_resource pr WHERE pr.p_id = #{packageId} AND r.id = pr.r_id
mapper.select:
SELECT r.*,o.name as device_org FROM ( SELECT tdr.f_id , tdr.p_id , tdr.r_id , m.org_id, tdr.state, tdr.create_time, aa.u_id AS device_id , m.machine_name as device_name, tp. NAME AS package_name , ts. NAME AS resource_name , aa.end_time
FROM ( SELECT td.id , td.u_id , td.end_time FROM t_distribution td WHERE td.state = 1 AND td.is_delete = 0 ) aa LEFT JOIN t_distribution_records tdr ON aa.id = tdr.f_id LEFT JOIN t_package tp ON tdr.p_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN t_resource ts ON tdr.r_id = ts.id LEFT JOIN machine m ON aa.u_id = m.id ) r,organization o WHERE 1 = 1 AND o.id = r.org_id AND r.package_name LIKE #{name} OR r.resource_name LIKE #{name} AND r.create_time > #{startTime} AND r.create_time < #{endTime}
